"The greatest enterprise of the mind always has been and always will be the attempt to link the sciences and the humanities. The ongoing fragmentation of knowledge and the resulting chaos in philosophy are not reflections of the real world but artifacts of scholarship."

- E. O. Wilson, Back from Chaos, The Atlantic Monthly, March 1998
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Current Fragmentation of Knowledge Results from Scholarship
